scenario:
Realty Income, Organon, and United Parcel Service are three high-yielding dividend stocks that can provide a good mix of income investments for a portfolio. Investing $11,000 in each of these stocks can generate a total of $2,040 per year in dividends. 

Realty Income, a diversified real estate investment trust, has a 6% yield and has increased its monthly dividend 128 times since going public in 1994. Its funds from operations per share totaled $2.99 in the first nine months of 2024, higher than its monthly dividend. Investing $11,000 in Realty Income can generate approximately $660 in dividends over a year.

Organon, a women's health company, has a 7.4% yield and a payout ratio of 22%. It has consistently posted a profit in each of the past four quarters. Investing $11,000 in Organon can generate approximately $810 in annual dividends.

United Parcel Service, a logistics giant, has a 5.2% yield and has been struggling to generate positive growth due to challenging macroeconomic conditions. However, its revenue rose by 6% in its most recent quarterly update. Investing $11,000 in United Parcel Service can generate approximately $570 in annual dividend income.
